Quote.Author: Mary Tyler Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't eat pure sugar. I can't have candy

Quote.Author: Mary Tyler Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: You truly have to make the very best of what you've got. We all do

Quote.Author: Mary Wollstonecraft
Quote.QuoteValue: It is justice, not charity, that is wanting in the world

Quote.Author: Mary Wollstonecraft
Quote.QuoteValue: The beginning is always today

Quote.Author: Mary Wollstonecraft
Quote.QuoteValue: The being cannot be termed rational or virtuous, who obeys any authority, but that of reason

Quote.Author: Mary Wollstonecraft
Quote.QuoteValue: Virtue can only flourish among equals

Quote.Author: Mary Wollstonecraft
Quote.QuoteValue: Surely something resides in this heart that is not perishable - and life is more than a dream

Quote.Author: Mary Wollstonecraft
Quote.QuoteValue: Strengthen the female mind by enlarging it, and there will be an end to blind obedience

Quote.Author: Mary Wollstonecraft
Quote.QuoteValue: Every political good carried to the extreme must be productive of evil

Quote.Author: Mary Wollstonecraft
Quote.QuoteValue: No man chooses evil because it is evil; he only mistakes it for happiness, the good he seeks

Quote.Author: Mary Wollstonecraft
Quote.QuoteValue: How can a rational being be ennobled by any thing that is not obtained by its own exertions?

Quote.Author: Mary Wollstonecraft
Quote.QuoteValue: Why is our fancy to be appalled by terrific perspectives of a hell beyond the grave?

Quote.Author: Mason Cooley
Quote.QuoteValue: The lonely become either thoughtful or empty

Quote.Author: Mason Cooley
Quote.QuoteValue: Flattery and insults raise the same question: What do you want?

Quote.Author: Mason Cooley
Quote.QuoteValue: Preserving tradition has become a nice hobby, like stamp collecting

Quote.Author: Mason Cooley
Quote.QuoteValue: Travelers never think that they are the foreigners

Quote.Author: Mason Cooley
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Be faithful to your roots' is the liberal version of 'Stay in your ghetto.'

Quote.Author: Mason Cooley
Quote.QuoteValue: Cats are inquisitive, but hate to admit it

Quote.Author: Mason Cooley
Quote.QuoteValue: The ravaged face in the mirror hides the enchanting youth that is the real me

Quote.Author: Mason Cooley
Quote.QuoteValue: Fantasy mirrors desire. Imagination reshapes it

Quote.Author: Mason Cooley
Quote.QuoteValue: Moo may represent an idea, but only the cow knows

Quote.Author: Mason Cooley
Quote.QuoteValue: In love, we worry more about the meaning of silences than the meaning of words

Quote.Author: Matt Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive

Quote.Author: Matt Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: Little things can make such a big difference during recording

Quote.Author: Matt Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: If PJ Harvey ever came to town I'd definitely go try to go see her

Quote.Author: Matt Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: The fact that Eddie Vedder likes to play 3 hour plus shows a night, I have to be ready for that

Quote.Author: Matt Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever Elvin Jones comes to Seattle I try to go catch him

Quote.Author: Matt Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: I think every band is a little cautious when the drummer starts to write tunes

Quote.Author: Matt Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: I show up ready to play, so I normally try and fit the situation

Quote.Author: Matt Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, I just try to make sure I eat enough and drink enough water and that's about it

Quote.Author: Matt Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the way Pharell is laying down great drum tracks. He is a great drummer

Quote.Author: Matt Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: My recording career has luckily run the gamut of recording environments

Quote.Author: Matt Groening
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to embrace the future. You can whine about it, but you've got to embrace it

Quote.Author: Matt Groening
Quote.QuoteValue: Me fail english? Thats unpossible

Quote.Author: Matt Groening
Quote.QuoteValue: Here's to alcohol: the cause of, and answer to, all of life's problems

Quote.Author: Matt Groening
Quote.QuoteValue: Donuts. Is there anything they can't do?

Quote.Author: Matt Groening
Quote.QuoteValue: Families are about love overcoming emotional torture

Quote.Author: Matt Groening
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, most grown-ups forget what it was like to be a kid. I vowed that I would never forget

Quote.Author: Matt Groening
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have to be careful, I've got a gun

Quote.Author: Matt Groening
Quote.QuoteValue: God often gives nuts to toothless people

Quote.Author: Matt Groening
Quote.QuoteValue: When DVDs finally disappear, I'm going to be sad. I'll miss the commentaries

Quote.Author: Matt Groening
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't have a cow, man

Quote.Author: Matt Mullenweg
Quote.QuoteValue: Ubuntu is doing amazing things, and I think it's going to change the face of the desktop

Quote.Author: Matt Mullenweg
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, open source is a moral thing

Quote.Author: Matt Mullenweg
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't think about work in your bedroom or relaxation area

Quote.Author: Matt Mullenweg
Quote.QuoteValue: Immunity to obsolescence is the only obsolescent-immune conceit of the past millennium

Quote.Author: Matt Mullenweg
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have big ideas. I sometimes have small ideas, which seem to work out

Quote.Author: Matt Mullenweg
Quote.QuoteValue: Technology is best when it brings people together

Quote.Author: Matt Mullenweg
Quote.QuoteValue: Much of the lifeblood of blogs is search engines - more than half the traffic for most blogs

Quote.Author: Matt Mullenweg
Quote.QuoteValue: Red notification bubbles on any icon, including mail, drive me crazy

Quote.Author: Matt Mullenweg
Quote.QuoteValue: Akismet started on a $70 dollar-a-month server. Anyone can scrape together $70

Quote.Author: Matt Mullenweg
Quote.QuoteValue: The mobile world is very closed and proprietary just by definition

Quote.Author: Matthew Desmond
Quote.QuoteValue: My dad was a preacher

Quote.Author: Matthew Desmond
Quote.QuoteValue: Fire itself is very beautiful, and there's an attachment to fire that firefighters have

Quote.Author: Matthew Desmond
Quote.QuoteValue: When I want to understand a problem, I want to understand it from the ground level

Quote.Author: Matthew Desmond
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm from a small town, and I thought I would be a lawyer

Quote.Author: Matthew Desmond
Quote.QuoteValue: I left college with a deep sense that I needed to understand poverty more

Quote.Author: Matthew Desmond
Quote.QuoteValue: The things you're closest to are often the things you know least about

Quote.Author: Matthew Desmond
Quote.QuoteValue: An eviction is an incredibly time consuming and stressful event

Quote.Author: Matthew Desmond
Quote.QuoteValue: There are moving companies specializing in evictions, their crews working all day, every weekday

Quote.Author: Matthew Desmond
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes a good amount of time and money to establish a home. Eviction can erase all that

Quote.Author: Matthew Desmond
Quote.QuoteValue: You do learn how to cope from those who are coping

Quote.Author: Matthew Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: None so deaf as those that will not hear. None so blind as those that will not see

Quote.Author: Matthew Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: After a storm comes a calm

Quote.Author: Matthew Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: Many a dangerous temptation comes to us in gay, fine colours, that are but skin-deep

Quote.Author: Matthew Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not talking but walking that will bring us to heaven

Quote.Author: Matthew Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: No attribute of God is more dreadful to sinners than His holiness

Quote.Author: Matthew Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: Here is bread, which strengthens man's heart, and therefore is called the staff of Life

Quote.Author: Matthew Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: Saying and doing are two things

Quote.Author: Matthew Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: The Scriptures were written, not to make us astronomers, but to make us saints

Quote.Author: Matthew Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: Better late than never

Quote.Author: Matthew Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: The way to preserve the peace of the church is to preserve its purity

Quote.Author: Matthew McConaughey
Quote.QuoteValue: My life is the road, man. I need to keep moving

Quote.Author: Matthew McConaughey
Quote.QuoteValue: Man who invented the hamburger was smart; man who invented the cheeseburger was a genius

Quote.Author: Matthew McConaughey
Quote.QuoteValue: There aren't many things that are universally cool, and it's cool not to litter. I'd never do it

Quote.Author: Matthew McConaughey
Quote.QuoteValue: We dissect failure a lot more than we dissect success

Quote.Author: Matthew McConaughey
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to just revolve. I want to evolve. As a man, as a human, as a father, as a lover

Quote.Author: Matthew McConaughey
Quote.QuoteValue: Africa is probably one of the most beautiful places I have ever been

Quote.Author: Matthew McConaughey
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is a series of commas, not periods

Quote.Author: Matthew McConaughey
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can be mentally stimulated by the workout and find out how to get through it, it's more fun

Quote.Author: Matthew McConaughey
Quote.QuoteValue: I like having my hands in the clay. I like the movie-making process

Quote.Author: Matthew McConaughey
Quote.QuoteValue: A creep is someone who claims he's one thing but he's actually another

Quote.Author: Mattie Stepanek
Quote.QuoteValue: Unity is strength... when there is teamwork and collaboration, wonderful things can be achieved

Quote.Author: Mattie Stepanek
Quote.QuoteValue: Sunset is still my favorite color, and rainbow is second

Quote.Author: Mattie Stepanek
Quote.QuoteValue: Sad things happen. They do. But we don't need to live sad forever

Quote.Author: Mattie Stepanek
Quote.QuoteValue: Even though the future seems far away, it is actually beginning right now

Quote.Author: Mattie Stepanek
Quote.QuoteValue: Remember to play after every storm

Quote.Author: Mattie Stepanek
Quote.QuoteValue: Expressing my feelings and then the opportunity to share it with others is just such a gift

Quote.Author: Mattie Stepanek
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be remembered as a poet, a peacemaker, and a philosopher who played

Quote.Author: Mattie Stepanek
Quote.QuoteValue: My disease is a very rare form of muscular dystrophy, called disautonomic mitochondrial myopathy

Quote.Author: Mattie Stepanek
Quote.QuoteValue: The way of life is not as easy as some people think... like me

Quote.Author: Mattie Stepanek
Quote.QuoteValue: I write to express my thoughts, my feelings. I want people to think

Quote.Author: Maurice Sendak
Quote.QuoteValue: The distinctions of fine art bore me to death

Quote.Author: Maurice Sendak
Quote.QuoteValue: There must be more to life than having everything

Quote.Author: Maurice Sendak
Quote.QuoteValue: Mothers and children are human beings, and they will sometimes do the wrong thing

Quote.Author: Maurice Sendak
Quote.QuoteValue: Childhood is a tricky business. Usually, something goes wrong

Quote.Author: Maurice Sendak
Quote.QuoteValue: I adored Mickey Mouse when I was a child. He was the emblem of happiness and funniness

Quote.Author: Maurice Sendak
Quote.QuoteValue: All I wanted was to be straight so my parents could be happy

Quote.Author: Maurice Sendak
Quote.QuoteValue: There's something in this country that is so opposed to understanding the complexity of children

Quote.Author: Maurice Sendak
Quote.QuoteValue: Grown-ups are afraid for children. It's not children who are afraid

Quote.Author: Maurice Sendak
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to write something so simple, so short and so silly... and I want it to be for my brother

Quote.Author: Maurice Sendak
Quote.QuoteValue: There's so much more to a book than just the reading

Quote.Author: Maxwell Maltz
Quote.QuoteValue: Man maintains his balance, poise, and sense of security only as he is moving forward

Quote.Author: Maxwell Maltz
Quote.QuoteValue: You make mistakes. Mistakes don't make you

Quote.Author: Maxwell Maltz
Quote.QuoteValue: Our self image, strongly held, essentially determines what we become

Quote.Author: Maxwell Maltz
Quote.QuoteValue: Self-image sets the boundaries of individual accomplishment

Quote.Author: Maxwell Maltz
Quote.QuoteValue: Low self-esteem is like driving through life with your hand-brake on

Quote.Author: Maxwell Maltz
Quote.QuoteValue: If you make friends with yourself you will never be alone

Quote.Author: Maxwell Maltz
Quote.QuoteValue: You may live in an imperfect world but the frontiers are not closed and the doors are not all shut

Quote.Author: Maxwell Maltz
Quote.QuoteValue: To change a habit, make a conscious decision, then act out the new behavior

Quote.Author: Maxwell Maltz
Quote.QuoteValue: Your most important sale in life is to sell yourself to yourself

Quote.Author: Maxwell Maltz
Quote.QuoteValue: You can always find the sun within yourself if you will only search

Quote.Author: Maya Rudolph
Quote.QuoteValue: To have your childhood dream realized is a really big deal

Quote.Author: Maya Rudolph
Quote.QuoteValue: To grow up with the loss of your mother is a scar that never goes away

Quote.Author: Maya Rudolph
Quote.QuoteValue: If my time with my kids is shorter than it was yesterday, it's better than nothing

Quote.Author: Maya Rudolph
Quote.QuoteValue: I never thought I'd get a chance to do what I'm doing. It's such a dream

Quote.Author: Maya Rudolph
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that people who don't like kids are awful people

Quote.Author: Maya Rudolph
Quote.QuoteValue: I really love laughing

Quote.Author: Maya Rudolph
Quote.QuoteValue: Before I had children, everything about my life was devoted to Saturday Night Live

Quote.Author: Maya Rudolph
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know if comedy is a male sport. I always wondered that

Quote.Author: Maya Rudolph
Quote.QuoteValue: I've met people who are baffled by children, as though they were never children themselves

Quote.Author: Maya Rudolph
Quote.QuoteValue: No, no, no. Your accent is so beautiful

Quote.Author: Maynard James Keenan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a pessimist. But I'm a pessimist with a sense of responsibility

Quote.Author: Maynard James Keenan
Quote.QuoteValue: Reading is more of a left-brain process, and listening to music is a right-brain function

Quote.Author: Maynard James Keenan
Quote.QuoteValue: People have to follow their hearts, and if their hearts lead them to Wal-Mart, so be it

Quote.Author: Maynard James Keenan
Quote.QuoteValue: The idea is, if I can't heal from my art, then how can you heal?

Quote.Author: Maynard James Keenan
Quote.QuoteValue: Because as an only child, you have your own little world

Quote.Author: Maynard James Keenan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a lot easier to work with now than I have been in the past, for sure

Quote.Author: Maynard James Keenan
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't be a legend yet. I'm not dead

Quote.Author: Maynard James Keenan
Quote.QuoteValue: There is still a future with music, because people want music

Quote.Author: Maynard James Keenan
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people in general have neglected to learn about history

Quote.Author: Maynard James Keenan
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything we release with Tool is inspired by our music

Quote.Author: Meek Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: I know all I really wanna do is get money and take care of my family

Quote.Author: Meek Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: Work harder than anybody you've ever seen. That's what I believe

Quote.Author: Meek Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody think they're famous when they get 100,000 followers on Instagram and 5,000 on Twitter

Quote.Author: Meek Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: People say money ain't nothing; money is basically everything

Quote.Author: Meek Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: When my girl do better than me, I still win. When I do better than her, she still wins

Quote.Author: Meek Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: I watch my YouTube videos over and over

Quote.Author: Meek Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: I always wanted to be one of the hottest rappers

Quote.Author: Meek Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not gone remix a record I don't got no love for

Quote.Author: Meek Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to just be fully rapping my whole life

Quote.Author: Meek Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: I need, sometimes, individuals to spark an idea so that I can take off running

Quote.Author: Megan Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to live with the idea that karma is a very real thing. So I put out what I want to get back

Quote.Author: Megan Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a big family person. I'm more of a loner

Quote.Author: Megan Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never even come close to having a one-night stand

Quote.Author: Megan Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very confident in how I project my personality

Quote.Author: Megan Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I say things that I think are obviously sarcastic and people take them quite literally

Quote.Author: Megan Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a 'sexy' 'beautiful' woman. It takes a lot of work to make me look like a girl

Quote.Author: Megan Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Midnight Nation' is really interesting

Quote.Author: Megan Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't gone completely insane, but it might happen soon

Quote.Author: Megan Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm self-loathing, introverted, and neurotic

Quote.Author: Megan Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: I resent having to prove that I'm not a retard

Quote.Author: Meghan Markle
Quote.QuoteValue: I always want off-the-beaten-path, Anthony Bourdain-inspired travel

Quote.Author: Meghan Markle
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't sit around thinking about my titles and roles; I just do what feels right

Quote.Author: Meghan Markle
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom is a yoga instructor: 100% black with dreadlocks

Quote.Author: Meghan Markle
Quote.QuoteValue: I did calligraphy for the invitations for, like, Robin Thicke and Paula Patton's wedding

Quote.Author: Meghan Markle
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a sucker for a compliment

Quote.Author: Meghan Markle
Quote.QuoteValue: I love Ralph Lauren. As I travel so much, I prefer to shop online

Quote.Author: Meghan Markle
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm traveling, I won't miss an opportunity to try great pasta

Quote.Author: Meghan Markle
Quote.QuoteValue: I think my dad always saw how happy I was on set

Quote.Author: Meghan Markle
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never wanted to be a lady who lunches - I've always wanted to be a woman who works

Quote.Author: Meghan Markle
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents always told me if I believed something was wrong, I should try to fix it

Quote.Author: Megyn Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: Some things are worth the fat and calories, although I have to watch it like a hawk

Quote.Author: Megyn Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: In another life - and as I like to say, another body - I used to teach aerobics

Quote.Author: Megyn Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the worst tweeter ever. I don't know what I'm doing. I really don't

Quote.Author: Megyn Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a struggling guitar player

Quote.Author: Megyn Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: Television can be a very fickle place

Quote.Author: Megyn Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: I still don't consider myself a fashion girl

Quote.Author: Megyn Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: Before I got into TV, I wasn't fashionable at all

Quote.Author: Megyn Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: Just because you might have a sparring match on the air doesn't mean there's any personal animosity

Quote.Author: Megyn Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: Im a soulless lawyer. Give me any opinion and I can argue it

Quote.Author: Megyn Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: I've lived in New York state almost my entire life, so my votes never count

Quote.Author: Meister Eckhart
Quote.QuoteValue: If the only prayer you ever say in your entire life is thank you, it will be enough

Quote.Author: Meister Eckhart
Quote.QuoteValue: The price of inaction is far greater than the cost of making a mistake

Quote.Author: Meister Eckhart
Quote.QuoteValue: Do exactly what you would do if you felt most secure

Quote.Author: Meister Eckhart
Quote.QuoteValue: What we plant in the soil of contemplation, we shall reap in the harvest of action

Quote.Author: Meister Eckhart
Quote.QuoteValue: All God wants of man is a peaceful heart

Quote.Author: Meister Eckhart
Quote.QuoteValue: To be full of things is to be empty of God. To be empty of things is to be full of God

Quote.Author: Meister Eckhart
Quote.QuoteValue: He who would be serene and pure needs but one thing, detachment

Quote.Author: Meister Eckhart
Quote.QuoteValue: The outward work will never be puny if the inward work is great

Quote.Author: Meister Eckhart
Quote.QuoteValue: What a man takes in by contemplation, that he pours out in love

Quote.Author: Meister Eckhart
Quote.QuoteValue: God is at home, it's we who have gone out for a walk

Quote.Author: Mel Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're quiet, you're not living. You've got to be noisy and colorful and lively

Quote.Author: Mel Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Tragedy is when I cut my finger. Comedy is when you fall into an open sewer and die

Quote.Author: Mel Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: You got to be brave. If you feel something, you've really got to risk it

Quote.Author: Mel Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Life literally abounds in comedy if you just look around you

Quote.Author: Mel Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Humor is just another defense against the universe

Quote.Author: Mel Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll accept bad taste in a minute, as long as there's some great comedy minds and performances

Quote.Author: Mel Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: If God wanted us to fly, He would have given us tickets

Quote.Author: Mel Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything we do in life is based on fear, especially love

Quote.Author: Mel Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Bad taste is simply saying the truth before it should be said

Quote.Author: Mel Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: You're always a little disappointing in person because you can't be the edited essence of yourself

Quote.Author: Mel Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't make things complicated, that's the way they get all by themselves

Quote.Author: Mel Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: I like going in to different styles of acting and exploring stuff I haven't done before

Quote.Author: Mel Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: The Holy Ghost was working through me on this film, and I was just direction traffic

Quote.Author: Mel Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: Feminists don't like me, and I don't like them

Quote.Author: Mel Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: Acting is like lying. The art of lying well. I'm paid to tell elaborate lies

Quote.Author: Mel Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: Marriage is marriage. Everybody has problems

Quote.Author: Mel Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: I have learned that a bitter experience can make you stronger

Quote.Author: Mel Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think everything is pretty well preordained - even your mistakes

Quote.Author: Mel Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll always continue to work. I've never much depended on anyone but myself, as far as that goes

Quote.Author: Mel Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: I was spiritually bankrupt, and when that happens, it's like a spiritual cancer afflicts you

Quote.Author: Melania Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: I style myself and choose what to wear based on what I feel good in it

Quote.Author: Melania Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not that kind of wife who would say, 'Learn this' or 'Learn that.' I'm not a nagging wife

Quote.Author: Melania Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very political. I'm not political in public; I'm political at home

Quote.Author: Melania Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a 'yes' person. No matter who you are married to, you still need to lead your life

Quote.Author: Melania Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: I always loved fashion. My mother was a fashion designer, so it was always in my blood

Quote.Author: Melania Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy tennis, Pilates. I read magazines and love fashion

Quote.Author: Melania Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot change a person. Let them be. Let them be the way they are

Quote.Author: Melania Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: Donald is intensely loyal. To family, friends, employees, country

Quote.Author: Melania Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: I chose not to go into politics and policy. Those policies are my husband's job

Quote.Author: Melania Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: I love my childhood. It was a beautiful childhood

Quote.Author: Melinda Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: The premise of this foundation is one life on this planet is no more valuable than the next

Quote.Author: Melinda Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: We started this mostly from an intellectual place

Quote.Author: Melinda Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: We have to be careful in how we use this light shined on us

Quote.Author: Melinda Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: But we also believe in taking risks, because that's how you move things along

Quote.Author: Melinda Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: Microsoft certainly makes products for the Macintosh

Quote.Author: Melinda Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: Women around the world should have a tool that helps them plan their pregnancies

Quote.Author: Melinda Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't save kids just with vaccines

Quote.Author: Melinda Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: I learn in a different way. I learn experientially

Quote.Author: Melinda Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm constantly saying to myself, 'I'm lucky I was born in the United States.'

Quote.Author: Melinda Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: All lives have an equal value

Quote.Author: Melissa McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a princess, I don't want to be referred to as a princess - I find that super creepy

Quote.Author: Melissa McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: Part of being young is you think gaining 6 lbs. is the end of the world

Quote.Author: Melissa McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really know why I'm not thinner than I am

Quote.Author: Melissa McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: Comedy to me is all about the bumps and bruises and weird tics

Quote.Author: Melissa McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: When I believe in something, I'm like a dog with a bone

Quote.Author: Melissa McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll do almost anything for a laugh

Quote.Author: Melissa McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: I just don't lose weight easily

Quote.Author: Melissa McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a great pregnant woman

Quote.Author: Melissa McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I wish I were just magically a size 6 and I never had to give it a single thought

Quote.Author: Melissa McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really happy in my life

Quote.Author: Melody Beattie
Quote.QuoteValue: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow

Quote.Author: Melody Beattie
Quote.QuoteValue: Relationships are where we take our recovery on the road

Quote.Author: Melody Beattie
Quote.QuoteValue: Few things can make us feel crazier than expecting something from someone who has nothing to give

Quote.Author: Melody Beattie
Quote.QuoteValue: We can trust ourselves to know when our boundaries are being violated

Quote.Author: Melody Beattie
Quote.QuoteValue: Feel what you feel, know what you know, and set your relatives free to do the same

Quote.Author: Melody Beattie
Quote.QuoteValue: Each moment in time we have it all, even when we think we don't

Quote.Author: Melody Beattie
Quote.QuoteValue: There are almost as many definitions of co-dependency as there are experiences that represent it

Quote.Author: Melody Beattie
Quote.QuoteValue: We are on a very rich emotional and physical journey on this planet

Quote.Author: Melody Beattie
Quote.QuoteValue: Guilt can stop us from taking healthy care of ourselves

Quote.Author: Melody Beattie
Quote.QuoteValue: Some therapists have proclaimed: 'Co-dependency is anything, and everyone is co-dependent.'

Quote.Author: Mencius
Quote.QuoteValue: Friends are the siblings God never gave us

Quote.Author: Mencius
Quote.QuoteValue: Sincerity is the way to heaven

Quote.Author: Mencius
Quote.QuoteValue: The great man is he who does not lose his child's-heart

Quote.Author: Mencius
Quote.QuoteValue: Secure property in hand leads to peace in mind

Quote.Author: Mencius
Quote.QuoteValue: People can have a long-term life plan only if they know their private property is secure

Quote.Author: Mencius
Quote.QuoteValue: If the king loves music, there is little wrong in the land

Quote.Author: Mencius
Quote.QuoteValue: Mankind fears an evil man but heaven does not

Quote.Author: Mencius
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not difficult to govern. All one has to do is not to offend the noble families
